prompt: "As an AI, you have been assigned to invent a fresh word by a unique technique. This method mandates you to consider a certain sentence and select the inaugural letter of every single word within it. Upon collecting these initials, you are to unite them in the very sequential order they were extracted from, resulting in an unprecedented word. It's crucial to retain fidelity to this operation: primarily, analyze each word in the sentence methodically, secondly, obtain the first letter of each word, then, combine these letters to form a novel word. The final output should solely encompass the newly fabricated word, devoid of any explanatory text. Remember, speed and accuracy carry great weight in this task."
